title.narrative: MX Water Utilities Efficiency Improvement Project (PROME)

description.narrative: The PDO is to improve the efficiency of Participating Water Utilities through the provision of Technical Assistance and Financing.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IV, clause B. 1 (b) | Description :The Output Based Disbursements (OBD)Operational Manualhas been adopted by the Borrower, through CONAGUA, and is satisfactory to the Bank; and (ii) at least one Output-based SubprojectAgreement | Due Date: 30-Sep-2011
